GuavyTech Samples » Append To Page Element Using JavaScript Code

GuavyTech.appendTo is basically to place editors inside existing DOM elements. Unlike GuavyTech.replace, a target container to be replaced is no longer necessary. A new editor instance is inserted directly wherever it is desired. 

GuavyTech.appendTo( 'container_id',
	{ /* Configuration options to be used. */ }
	'Editor content to be used.'
);
